original_title: Hot Redheads - Gingers Do It Redder
overview: Everyone knows redheads do it better, and never has this been on hotter display than this fiery compilation from Hustler! Starring the irrepressible Jayme Langford, and featuring ginger hotties Alex Tanner, Jessica Ryan, Holly Morgan, Dani Jensen and Marie McCray, these carrot-top (and bottom! ) cuties are delivering unforgettable hardcore in every scarlet scene!
title: Hot Redheads - Gingers Do It Redder
